attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/j_mcelroy|@j_mcelroy>: the rarest of vancouver snow days

- sun is out
- people have fully adjusted to snow 
- roads are fine
- it’s slightly colder so slush puddles have stabilized
- enjoy while it lasts <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EOgHKYqWsAE2uvy.jpg>

the rarest of vancouver snow days
